className.transform: (() => { const variantClasses = { text: 'rounded h-4', rectangular: 'rounded-none', circular: 'rounded-full', rounded: 'rounded-lg' }; return 'bg-muted animate-pulse ' + (variantClasses[data] || variantClasses.rectangular); })()

style.transform: ([w, h]) => ({ width: typeof w === 'number' ? `${w}px` : w, height: typeof h === 'number' ? `${h}px` : h })
